common.frigate_card_description: A Lovelace card for use with Frigate

cameras.id: Unique id for this camera in this card
cameras.label: Frigate label/object filter
cameras.title: Title for this camera (Autodetected from entity)
cameras.icon: Icon for this camera (Autodetected from entity)
cameras.live_provider: Live view provider for this camera

live_providers.ha: Home Assistant (i.e. HLS, LL-HLS, WebRTC native)

webrtc_card.entity: WebRTC Card Camera Entity (Not a Frigate camera)

view.timeout_seconds: Reset to default view X seconds after user action (0=never)
view.update_cycle_camera: Cycle through cameras when default view updates
view.update_seconds: Refresh default view every X seconds (0=never)

event_viewer.lazy_load: Event Viewer media is lazily loaded in carousel

next_previous.style: Event Viewer next & previous control style
next_previous.size: Event Viewer next & previous control size (e.g. '48px')

title.mode: Event Viewer media title display mode
title.duration_seconds: Seconds to display popup title in Event Viewer (0=forever)

live.preload: Preload live view in the background
live.draggable: Live cameras view can be dragged/swiped

next_previous.style: Live view next & previous control style
next_previous.size: Live view next & previous control size (e.g. '48px')

thumbnails.media: Whether to show thumbnails of clips or snapshots

title.duration_seconds: Seconds to display popup title in Live view (0=forever)

image.src: Static image URL/data for image view
image.refresh_seconds: Number of seconds after which to refresh (0=never)

overrides.info: This card configuration has manually specified overrides configured which may override values shown in the visual editor, please consult the code editor to view/modify these overrides

editor.cameras_secondary: What cameras to render on this card
editor.view_secondary: What the card should show and how to show it
editor.upgrade_available: An automatic card configuration upgrade is available

error.empty_response: Received empty response from Home Assistant for request
error.invalid_response: Received invalid response from Home Assistant for request
error.no_live_camera: The camera_entity parameter must be set and valid for this live provider
error.invalid_configuration_no_hint: No location hint available (bad or missing type?)
error.upgrade_available: An automated card configuration upgrade is available, please visit the visual card editor
error.webrtc_card_waiting: Waiting for WebRTC Card to load ...
error.no_cameras: No valid cameras found, you must configure at least one camera entry
error.no_camera_id: Could not determine camera id for the following camera, may need to set 'id' parameter manually
error.duplicate_camera_id: Duplicate Frigate camera id for the following camera, use the 'id' parameter to uniquely identify cameras
error.jsmpeg_no_sign: Could not retrieve or sign JSMPEG websocket path
error.no_camera_name: Could not determine Frigate camera name for camera, please specify either 'camera_entity' or 'camera_name' for the following camera
error.download_no_event_id: Could not extract Frigate event id from media
error.download_sign_failed: Could not sign media URL for download
